snippet: In a toy industry increasingly turning to high-tech gadgetry and movie tie-ins, the Melissa & Doug company has thrived by sticking to the basics.
abstract: Melissa & Doug toy company has thrived by sticking to basics, despite industry trend of  increasingly turning to high-tech gadgetry and movie tie-ins; Doug and Melissa Bernstein do little public relations, almost no advertising and produce steady stream of variations on classic toys mostly for children up to age 5; 2013 revenue is estimated $325 million from $100 million in 2008, with 650 employees.
lead_paragraph: In a toy industry increasingly turning to high-tech gadgetry and movie tie-ins, the Melissa & Doug company has thrived by sticking to the basics.

headline.seo: At Melissa & Doug Toy Company, Thriving on the Basics
headline.main: No Tie-Ins. No Touch Screens. No Apps.
headline.print_headline: No Tie-Ins. No Touch Screens. No Apps.
